original: The driver of an oncoming car flashed his lights at Tom as a warning that there was a mobile speed camera up ahead. Tom, who had been speeding, immediately slowed down and passed the camera at just under the speed limit.
translated: L'autista di un'auto in arrivo fece lampeggiare le luci in direzione di Tom per avvertire che più avanti c'era un autovelox mobile. Tom, che stava sfrecciando, rallentò immediatamente e superò l'autovelox appena sotto il limite di velocità.

original: Have you ever consoled a friend?

original: If you don't want to put on sunscreen, that's your problem. Just don't come complaining to me when you get a sunburn.

original: I'll be as quick as I can.
